article_title: Group for babies stimulates the senses
article_text:

og.description: WILLIAMSPORT—Maura Beckett's 18 month-old daughter, Charlotte, is into everything. That's one reason why the Hagerstown mother of two brought Charlotte to the recent sensory play group at Williamsport Memorial Library, a branch of Washington County
